features: Sleek and Modern: With its minimalist design, our full size bed frame adds a touch of sophistication to any bedroom decor. The sleek lines and matte black finish create an elegant and timeless look that effortlessly complements any interior style.

High Quality: Our bed frame is made from premium heavy duty sturdy metal material, ensuring a stable and durable support for your queen size mattress. With a weight capacity of up to 1200 pounds, it provides a secure and comfortable sleep experience.
Easy Assembly: Designed with simplicity in mind, our full bed frame is easy to assemble without the need for any additional tools. Save time and effort with our user-friendly construction.
Noise-Free: Say goodbye to annoying squeaks and creaks! Our bed frame features a sturdy structure and specially designed joints, reducing noise and ensuring a peaceful night's sleep.

Underbed Storage: Make the most of your bedroom space with our bed frame's practical design. The ample 12" clearance under the bed provides an ideal storage solution for your extra bedding, seasonal clothing, or other items.
body.description: Novilla Simple Metal Bed Frame Mattress Foundation with Headboard & FootboardNovilla aims to provide a cozy and affordable home-making experience in a simple way for everyone.Dimensional Information： ● Twin: 77.5"L×39.4"W×39.4"H ● Full: 77.5"L×54.4"W×39.4"H ● Queen: 82.5"L×60.5"W×39.4"H ● King: 82.5"L×76.5"W×39.4"HMaximum Weight Capacity:Full/Queen/King: 1200LBSTips:Before installing the bed frame, please read the instructions carefully to ensure that all parts and screws are firmly attached before use.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Previous page Next page 1 Adequate Storage Space 2 Squeak Resistant 3 Sturdy Support

Unique Aesthetics and Practicality The simple and minimalist design blends effortlessly with any interior, creating an inviting and sophisticated atmosphere in your bedroom. Floor Protection and Noise Absorption Due to their sturdy construction, these footplugs are able to support the weight of the bed frame and distribute it evenly, reducing the risk of unwanted dents or marks on the floor.

Q1: Does this bed frame require any additional support or box spring? Answer: The bed frame is designed to provide excellent support for your mattress without the need for additional support or a box spring. Q2: What is the weight capacity of the bed frame? Answer: The full/queen/king can support a weight capacity of 1200 pounds, twin can support a weight capacity of 800lbs, ensuring stability and safety during use. Q3: Is the Novilla bed frame easy to assemble? Answer: Yes, the bed frame is designed for easy assembly. It comes with clear instructions and all the necessary hardware, making the setup process quick and hassle-free. Q4: Is the quality of this bed frame reliable? Answer: Yes, our bed frame is crafted with great attention to detail and undergoes strict quality control to ensure the highest standards of reliability. Q5: Can the bed frames accommodate multiple mattress sizes? Answer: Yes, the bed frame is designed to accommodate various mattress sizes, including Twin, Full, Queen, and King sizes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for the price
reviews.reviewText: I sas surprised how sturdy it actually is ! This bed frame was super easy to put together and comes with everything you need! It's sturdy and took me about 1.5 hours just using the little alan wrench it comes with.After installation, I have a nice, sleek, chic, modern, and most importantly, comfortable bed frame. I slept so well! Getting off the box spring/wheeled frame makes such a difference. The bed is solid and very sturdy and is also silent. The bed I had before was super tall but this is low profile, easy to get in/out of and was easy to put together. This is a wonderful bed at a great price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very good, very comfortable
reviews.reviewText: This bed is awesome, it so easy to put together and looks very nice. Quickly to put it together. I don’t listen the noise from the bed.the size is good for two people. I love the design. My husband used twenty minutes to install it. I 100 percent to recommend this bed , the size is good, the price is good, design very good.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sleek and Sturdy
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the Novilla bedframe, and it's been a fantastic addition to my bedroom. The frame is made from high-quality steel, ensuring durability and stability. I was particularly impressed by the sleek, modern design that easily blended with my contemporary decor. The assembly process was straightforward, with clear instructions and all tools included. It took me under an hour to set it up. The frame provides excellent support for my memory foam mattress, and there's no creaking or movement, even when I toss and turn. The under-bed clearance is a bonus, offering ample storage space. Despite its sturdiness, it's surprisingly lightweight and easy to move when needed.For the price, I believe the Novilla offers great value, especially considering its durability and design. My only minor gripe is that I wish it came in more color options. Overall, it's a solid, attractive, and functional bed frame that I'd highly recommend to anyone in the market for a reliable and stylish option.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy ,compact and easy to build together, good quality
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the Novilla Metal king Size Bed Frame, and I am extremely satisfied with my investment. Arrived fast and looks great! Sits High up so plenty of room for storage underneath.The frame is well-constructed with sturdy materials, providing excellent support for the mattress. Assembly was relatively straightforward, thanks to clear instructions and labeled parts.One standout feature is the modern design, adding a sleek and stylish touch to my bedroom. The frame's durability is impressive, and it feels robust and stable. I appreciate the under-bed storage space, which is a practical addition for keeping the bedroom organized.The bed frame also fits well with various decor styles, making it a versatile choice for different aesthetics.One of the standout features for me is the sturdiness of the frame. It provides excellent support for the mattress, ensuring a comfortable and restful night's sleep. The durability is impressive, and I can tell that this bed frame is built to last.I appreciate the thoughtful design that includes under-bed storage space, offering a practical solution for keeping my bedroom organized and clutter-free. The quality of the materials used is evident, and the overall construction feels solid and reliable.In summary, this bed frame offers a great combination of style, functionality, and durability. While there are minor concerns with sharp edges, the overall quality and design make it a worthwhile purchase for a comfortable and aesthetically pleasing bedroom.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Overall the bed frame is nice and sturdy. The description was as it said. I like the matte black finish and it’s light weight enough to move around easily by myself. I gave this a 4 star rating because there were no instructions in the box for me to make sure I had all parts. I spent over an hour looking at the images posted for the product and with a little process of elimination I figured out which screws went to which parts. All the parts were there so I was able to put the bed together in about 30 minutes. I’m very satisfied with this purchase!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfectly made for small spaces, sturdy, and beautiful.
reviews.reviewText: I was pleasantly surprised with this bedframe! The original one I purchased was for a canopy bed and I was a little crushed when it wouldn't fit in my apartment - so I rush ordered this one as it fit the aesthetic I was going for and was decently priced. I honestly like it a lot and it was pretty easy to go together minus some assembler error (I put one of the legs upside down at first LOL) Once I got it figured out, it went together easily in about 30 minutes and fit my bed beautifully. It fit into the space wonderfully and I'm happy with it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Solid Bed Frame, Simple Assembly
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased a bed frame and have been pleasantly surprised by its quality and ease of assembly. The bed frame feels sturdy and well-built, providing a stable foundation for my mattress. Its simple design blends nicely with my bedroom decor, and the neutral color options ensure compatibility with various styles. Assembly was straightforward, with clear instructions and pre-drilled holes that made the process hassle-free. Overall, it's a great value for the price and has made a noticeable improvement in my sleeping experience. Highly recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Bought this bed frame for my son and he loves it. The style needs to be simple yet fashionable. Easy to assemble, the quality is better than expected, the materials are strong, the surface is very smooth and it is sturdy and stable without wobbling at all. It won't make any strange noises even if you sleep on it. The height is right and there is lots of space under the bed for storage. Good value for money and highly recommended.
